node.text:
Tokyo 2020 provides a milestone moment to showcase LGBTQ+ representation in sports on an international stage and present sports as they should be – inclusive and accessible to all athletes. To recognize this historical moment, P&G hosted a discussion bringing together LGBTQ+ athletes and allies to share their experiences and discuss the importance of equal representation and equal opportunity for all individuals – particularly in sports.
 
By amplifying the stories of LGBTQ+ athletes, we are taking a necessary step to create a full inclusive culture and continuing our aspiration of creating a world where equality & inclusion are achievable for all. As part of a $100,000 commitment, P&G will partner with @athleteally to help fuel and scale Athlete Ally’s LGBTQ+ education, sport policy reform, and athlete activism pillars of work. #LeadWithLove

shortcode_media.title: Equal Representation in Sports: Why LGBTQ+ Visibility Matters
